title: Your Purchase could not be complete at this time. Store Visual Bug
body: Please fix store visual bug! Unable to buy champs

replies.body:
Many people are also experiencing the same issue. I've sent a request to Riot and started a thread here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug

For now, we just have to wait for them to fix it.
A Riot employee has also commented on his thread and has said he'll give updates when possible. You're all best to look at his thread.
This issue has been raised many, many times. I'm sure Riot is working on the problem. For now all you have to do is re-log.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/NTgqPgpm-ip-store-glitch?comment=0005

Made a thread concerning this problem as well.Closest fix we can reach is probably worlds patch 5.18.
We just have to wait for the meantime.For the moment just continue saving up ip.
I submitted a request to rito support to fix it
I've logged in and out, and restarted my PC it still says i cannot purchase the champion i want (Elise 6300ip)
